name: Mikerobe - Arcade Action Racing Game
description:
Steer Mike through laps of the bacterial gloop avoiding toxic hazards and rescuing as many of Mike's buddies as you can. There is one cruel twist; each lap gets faster and faster and FASTER, testing your reflexes and concentration to levels beyond humanly possible!

However... it's so easy to play that anyone can pick it up and start having fun; from kids all the way up to their Grandparents - everyone is invited! Download MikeRobe now and compete against your family and friends on Game Center or send them a personal challenge directly from the game.

How many buddies can you rescue before the speed kills you?

MikeRobe is Superpowered
http://superpowered.com/
